name: Mekafusion #17 MF06-SKY-JET
description:
Model: MF06-SKY-JET ( Mekanic Fusion no.6 - SKY JET )
Series: WING

Fusions:
BM05-COMBAT ( Base Mekanoid no.05 - SKY )
MG - SU30Mk32 Custom ( Sukhoi 30 MK-32 Customized Meta Gear Fighter Jet )

★ Properties
• Type: Mekafusion
• Skills: Speed, combat skills, air support
• Weapon: Heat-seeking missiles
• Perks: Launches heat-seeking missiles for air support.

A Mekanic fusion between Base model and Meta Gear to form Mekafusion in WING series. A combat jet customized infusion for air combat and support with a barrage of heat-seeking missiles.

⚔ The Project - Mekafusion [ Mekanic Fusion ] 
An alliance between Meka and Meta to join forces to form ultimate mechanical robotic machines in different series in the Metaverse.

These are digitally hand-drawn in 2D artwork to make Robotic Figures 'Mekanoid'. The concept comes in different series to give mechas their Artificial Intelligence to create their own character and make lots of unique Mekafusions.

The goal is to make robot designs as it was been my childhood hobby to draw robots. Now minted in Tezos blockchain as Non-fungible Tokens (NFT) to give opportunities to art collectors and traders. Artwork is created in image 4000x4000 pixel HD resolution quality made as an iconic figure art collectible.

You can visit me on my Twitter page as the creator of Mekafusion - @XTZverse

★★★★★
Check out the website for more information at mekafusion.com
